/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and red accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. In the foreground, trees and street furniture can be seen, providing a sense of scale and context to the urban environment. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
